attributes.action: Public Inquiry into the lies and misinformation made in support of leaving EU
attributes.additional_details: Use the findings of the Public Inquiry (or not as the case may be) to make persons /groups responsible for the lies and misinformation wholly accountable for their actions.
attributes.background: Lies and misinformation by key government members/groups seemingly wholly designed to misinform the UK public and directly influencing the result of the public referendum for leaving or remaining in the EU
